overview:
Brad Young is best described as a combination of creative philosopher, tech geek and commercial mind.

He’s a life student of technology, social sciences and creative arts with a deep interest in how people and crowds interact, how the mind works and how technology can serve human development.

Brad’s career experience began in London advertising agencies before moving into the tech world where he gained several years of blue chip experience architecting, building and managing large scale enterprise applications using SAP, Oracle and Microsoft technologies. Having worked in 2 of the Big 4 IT consulting firms (Accenture and KPMG) delivering IT systems for Unilever, Shell, Cadbury Schweppes and Procter & Gamble.

Brad is the founder of http://www.nostradamical.com - a social prediction platform that allows people to publish their predictions (like a blog) and forecast the predictions of others. If they get predictions correct they gain ‘Future Minutes’ and rise up the Nostradamical pyramid in status, moving to the homepage. Nostradamical is integrated with Twitter and Friendfeed.

Brad is based in Worcestershire, UK. Join Brad’s linked in network here: http://www.linkedin.com/in/bradpyoung

Visit the Nostradamical Blog at http://www.nostradamical.com/blog
